These are APIs of authenticate.

Authentication¶

SignUp¶

POST /api/auth/sign_up/

Parameters¶

Name

Type

Option

Description

phone

string

required

user phone

password

string

required

user password

identity

int

optional

0(default): normal, 1: VIP, 2: VVIP

nickname

string

optional

“”(default)

Response¶

{
  "data": "success"
}

Login¶

POST /api/auth/login/

Parameters¶

Name

Type

Option

Description

username

string

required

user phone

password

string

required

user password

Response¶

{
   "refresh": "eyJ0eXAiO*******UHmGI4TdVR97TRpFgkdAzi3gI1g",
   "access": "eyJ0eXAiOi*******u7HVQCjKMqCIxi3e_j6eGg",
   "nickname": "Yam0"
}

Attention : The access token only valid in 5 minutes, after that, you need to refresh.

Refresh¶

POST /api/auth/refresh/

Parameters¶

Name

Type

Option

Description

refresh

string

required

the refresh token

Response¶

{
   "access": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJ********D2Nhj_O8nq_jOpvsMm9to"
}

Users¶

ListUsers¶

POST /api/auth/users/

UserDetail¶

POST /api/auth/users/<user_id>/
